description.text: The biggest fight of the year is set for May 8 at AT&T Stadium in Arlington, Texas, as WBA, WBC and Ring Magazine champion and the number one pound-for-pound fighter in the world, Canelo Alvarez, meets Billy Joe Saunders, the holder of the WBO belt, in a battle for super middleweight supremacy.
description.link: Read more about the NFT Drop

own-it-block.title: Own a piece of history
own-it-block.description-part-one: This stunning collection of NFTs commemorates the fight and even gets buyers into the action! All NFTs come with special unlockable bonuses! The extremely rare Gold and Legendary NFTs unlock premium items and experiences like signed gloves by the fighters and tickets to a future fight. Check out the limited NFT collections below and check back for more details soon.
own-it-block.description-part-two: Pre-fight sales will go live on fight day,
own-it-block.link: Want to know more about NFTs?

countdown.text-purchase-one: The first drop will be available for
countdown.text-purchase-two: purchase at 7AM ET / 12:00 GMT on May 8th

legendary.name: Legendary
legendary.description: If Canelo wins, annual DAZN subscription for all NFT holders + all NFT holders entered into drawing for 1 personalized video to randomly selected winner

gold.name: Gold
gold.description: If Canelo wins, annual DAZN subscription for all NFT holders + all NFT holders entered into drawing for 1 personalized video to randomly selected winner

bronze.name: Bronze
bronze.description: If Canelo wins, annual DAZN subscription for all NFT holders + all NFT holders entered into drawing for 1 personalized video to randomly selected winner

register.title: Don't miss the drop
register.content-text: SIGN UP TO BE THE FIRST TO KNOW ABOUT FIGHT HIGHLIGHT NFTs AND OTHER FUTURE DAZN NFT DROPS
register.form-text: Every now and then we may send you e-mails with news, promotionsor special offers about DAZN which may be of interest to you.
register.checkbox-text: If you do not want to receive these messages please click here
register.modal-text: Keep an eye on your email inbox for exclusive news about DAZN NFTs!
